properties.description: Please fill out the following information about your thesis:
properties.title: Undergraduate Submission Information

properties.description: The title of your thesis (everything before the colon)
properties.title: Title

properties.description: The subtitle of your thesis (everything after the colon). Don't worry, we'll make sure the full title displays correctly!
properties.title: Subtitle

properties.description: The family name of the thesis author (ex. "Smith")
properties.title: Family Name

properties.description: The given name of the thesis author (ex. "John," "Jane W.")
properties.title: Given Name

properties.description: The family name of the thesis advisor (ex. "Smith")
properties.title: Family Name

properties.description: The given name of the thesis advisor (ex. "John," "Jane W.")
properties.title: Given Name

properties.description: Please provide the name of a second thesis advisor, if applicable.
properties.title: Second Thesis Advisor

properties.description: If you have more than one thesis advisor, please provide the name of the second advisor here.

create.value: <mods:genre authority="ndltd" type="work type">Electronic Thesis or Dissertation</mods:genre>

properties.description: The year that your thesis was approved.
properties.title: Year

properties.description: The name(s) of language(s) the item is published in. English is the default. To add multiple languages, click the plus button (+) after entering the first language.
properties.title: Language(s)

properties.description: The method by which a resource achieved digital form, as defined by MODS standards.
A description of your thesis (approximately 100 – 150 words)
properties.title: Abstract
Keyword(s)
